title: BS CLIENT FREEZES
body: This is really starting to piss me off... Recently, whenever I get into games my client begins to freeze, causing me to receive a dodge penalty. I just lost 10 lp on a "dodge" because Riot's spaghetti code client froze and I'm stuck with a 30 minute time penalty. Fix this nonsense please...

replies.body:
It sounds like your game client is losing it's connection to our game servers when you're at the champion loading screen. If this is the case, our [Connections Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) should be able to shed some light on the underlying issue.

Let me know how this works for you!

Hello, Im having these issues, I never had them, I uploaded the video the example when this happens
https://youtu.be/GLVHZp6vn-A

From watching your video, it looks like your network could be having some issues keeping a stable connection with our game servers. When this happens, you can see delays like this where spells take a few seconds to fire off or champions seems to jump around. If you go through our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) you should be able to narrow down the issue.

Hit me back up if you have any questions.
Are you using new or legacy client?
